entry.title: First Blog Post Test
entry.content:
hello? is this thing on?

```csharp public string CalculateMD5Hash(string input) { // step 1, calculate MD5 hash from input MD5 md5 = System.Security.Cryptography.MD5.Create(); byte[] inputBytes = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(input); byte[] hash = md5.ComputeHash(inputBytes);

// step 2, convert byte array to hex string StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(); for (int i = 0; i < hash.Length; i++) {

sb.Append(hash[i].ToString("X2"));

} return sb.ToString(); } ```
